title: transactions
description: All executed transactions on the Smart Chain

id.description: Database type: bigint. Default value: nextval('transactions_id_seq'::regclass)

confirmed_at.description: Database type: timestamp with time zone. Default value: null

tx_hash.description: Database type: text. Default value: null

block.description: Database type: bigint. Default value: null

from_id.description: Database type: bigint. Default value: null

to_id.description: Database type: bigint. Default value: null

value.description: Database type: text. Default value: null

tx_fee.description: Database type: text. Default value: null
